/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings in the background are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
